title: Leading chemical drugs dispensed in England 2018 , by items
yAxis: Number of items dispensed in millions
summary: This is a bar chart representing Item in the x axis and Number of items dispensed in millions in the y axis.
Item Atorvastatin has the highest Number of items dispensed in millions and Bendroflumethiazide has the lowest Number of items dispensed in millions.
The difference of Number of items dispensed in millions between the highest and lowest Item is 31.8.
min_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Item, and Number of items dispensed in millions in each Item on the y axis.
The Number of items dispensed in millions is highest at Item Atorvastatin and lowest at Item Bendroflumethiazide.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Item in the x axis and Number of items dispensed in millions in the y axis.
The Number of items dispensed in millions is highest at Item Atorvastatin and lowest at Item Bendroflumethiazide.
Item  has the second highest value for Number of items dispensed in millions.

Item Atorvastatin is higher than any other Items with value 41.8, followed by , and Omeprazole. Down to Item Bendroflumethiazide with the lowest value 10.0.
